name: MonkeyPoo!
short_description: MonkeyPoo!  is a fun, fast Real-Time-Strategy game, made with the Stratagus engine.  The gameplay focuses on strategy, rather than tactics, providing players with faster gameplay than other RTSs.  The game features a primate theme, and a sense of humour.
